solution_line_template: Since Cindy gave {marbles_cindy_gave} marbles, then she only has {cindy_initial_marbles} - {marbles_cindy_gave} = <<{cindy_initial_marbles}-{marbles_cindy_gave}={cindy_marbles_after_giving}>>{cindy_marbles_after_giving} marbles left.
Since Lisa received {marbles_cindy_gave} marbles, then Lisa has {lisa_initial_marbles} + {marbles_cindy_gave} = {lisa_marbles_after_receiving} marbles now.

Hence, Lisa has {lisa_marbles_after_receiving} - {cindy_marbles_after_giving} = <<{lisa_marbles_after_receiving}-{cindy_marbles_after_giving}={lisa_more_than_cindy_now}>>{lisa_more_than_cindy_now} marbles more than Cindy.
